title: Agency (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014), following consultation with
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency 

(Amendment) Act 2014 (Designated Body) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national treasury management agency (amendment) act 2014 (designated body) order 2024

title: Agency (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014), following consultation with
heading: 2. The Land Development Agency shall be a designated body for the
text_raw:
2. The Land Development Agency shall be a designated body for the 
the National Treasury Management Agency 

purposes of Part 3 of 
(Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 January, 2024. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 26th January, 2024.
